channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Top Verizon Promo Codes & Deals | August 2025
item.description: Save with our roundup of the best Verizon coupons for free iPhone 16 Pros up to $1,100 off new Galaxy phones, and plans up to 50% off this August.

item.title: Space Force bets on commercial entrants in $4B satcom contest
item.description: The Space Force is leveraging commercial competition for the next phase of its PTS program.

item.title: ChatGPT’s Study Mode Is Here. It Won’t Fix Education’s AI Problems
item.description: OpenAI’s new study mode for ChatGPT throws questions back at students, but the learning feature doesn’t address generative AI’s underlying disruption ...

item.title: The 38 Best Shows on Apple TV+ Right Now (August 2025)
item.description: Chief of War, Murderbot, and Foundation are among the best shows on Apple TV+ this month.

item.title: Luma and Runway expect robotics to eventually be a big revenue driver for them
item.description: Both Luma and Runway have reportedly held conversations with self-driving car and robotics companies as they look toward the future.

item.title: Nvidia AI chip challenger Groq said to be nearing new fundraising at $6B valuation
item.description: AI chip startup Groq is in talks to raise a fresh $600 million at a near $6 billion valuation, sources tell Bloomberg, although the deal isn’t yet fin...

item.title: Google says UK government has not demanded an encryption backdoor for its users’ data
item.description: Google refused to tell a U.S. senator whether the company had received a secret U.K. surveillance order demanding access to encrypted data, similar to...

item.title: Anthropic reportedly nears $170B valuation with potential $5B round
item.description: The new round is being led by Iconiq Capital, with the possibility of a co-lead investor joining.

item.title: The Pandemic Appears to Have Accelerated Brain Aging, Even in People Who Never Got Covid
item.description: Stress, isolation, and uncertainty appear to have caused the brain to age quicker for those who lived through the crisis.

item.title: Big Tech Asked for Looser Clean Water Act Permitting. Trump Wants to Give It to Them
item.description: New AI regulations suggested by the White House mirror changes to environmental permitting suggested by Meta and a lobbying group representing firms l...
